ProcessTemplates.Name: XML to XML - Transform using XSLT
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template reads an XML file from a local fileshare, transforms it using an XSLT stylesheet, and saves the result locally.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_input_filename.xml\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the input XML file, including the file name."},"XsltScript":{"Value":"\"<xsl:stylesheet>...</xsl:stylesheet>\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The XSLT stylesheet for transforming the XML data."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/example_directory/example_output_filename.xml\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The full path of the output XML file, including the file name."}}
